texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Fedora 22 will be  arriving soon  and it's easy to test on Rackspace's cloud with my Ansible playbook:
texts.text: Fedora 22 will be  arriving soon  and it's easy to test on Rackspace's cloud with my Ansible playbook:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: As with the  previous playbook  I created for Fedora 21, this playbook will ensure your Fedora 21 instance is fully up to date and then perform the upgrade to Fedora 22.
texts.text: As with the  previous playbook  I created for Fedora 21, this playbook will ensure your Fedora 21 instance is fully up to date and then perform the upgrade to Fedora 22.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: WARNING : It's best to use this playbook against a non-production system. Fedora 22 is an alpha release at the time of this post's writing.
texts.text: WARNING : It's best to use this playbook against a non-production system. Fedora 22 is an alpha release at the time of this post's writing.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This playbook should work well against other servers and virtual machines from other providers but there are a few things that are Rackspace-specific cleanups that might not apply to other servers.
texts.text: This playbook should work well against other servers and virtual machines from other providers but there are a few things that are Rackspace-specific cleanups that might not apply to other servers.
